Posts.Content: Jackie19 wrote: Hi, I just had my first CTherapy last Tuesday and was wondering if  anyone had also experienced skin rash, hives and itching after having CTherapy?  Dx 9/28/2007, IDC, 1cm, Stage II, Grade 2, 1/15 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
